title: Diagnose 'Flapping' Network Link
description: A network link between two switches is repeatedly going up and down. The agent must stabilize it.

tasks.description: Identify the flapping link from the network monitoring system alerts.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly identifies the two switches and the port numbers involved.

tasks.description: Check the physical layer diagnostics for the ports (e.g., light levels for fiber, cable test for copper).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds that the fiber optic light levels are marginal, suggesting a dirty connector or failing transceiver.

tasks.description: Create a ticket for a data center technician to physically inspect and clean the fiber connection.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a ticket with specific instructions for the technician.
